entry1.paragraph:
Your data is safe with us. All your information is stored solely on your phone in an SQLite database and protected with strong 256‑bit AES encryption. This ensures that no one but you has access to it. We place great importance on data protection and deliberately refrain from storing or sharing your data on external servers.

If you use the e‑mail service, your e‑mail address, password and mail server are also protected with the same strong encryption before any processing. This keeps your sensitive information as secure as possible at all times. Your privacy is our top priority – you always retain full control over your data.

entry2.subheading: How does the e‑mail server work?
entry2.paragraph:
With our e‑mail service you can easily send your application package directly to the e‑mail address of your desired company – all you need is the relevant contact address. The subject line and a template for the e‑mail text are generated automatically so the process is quick and straightforward.

Your data is transferred to our server using secure 2048‑bit encryption, where the application package is decrypted and forwarded directly to the recipient. No logs are created and no data is stored permanently – the information remains only temporarily in cache and is deleted immediately after forwarding.

We are already working on a fully local version of this service so you will have even more control over your data in the future. The service is completely free and optional – you decide whether you want to use it.

entry3.paragraph: You can either have a completely new cover letter created or reuse an existing one. For only about 1 cent per generation, you can have a cover letter tailored to the desired position produced. Alternatively, you can reuse and modify a previous cover letter by selecting the company, redefining the contact person and editing the text as you wish. This saves you time while keeping every application flexible to adapt.

entry1.title: 1. General Information
entry1.text: This privacy policy explains how the application tool processes personal data.

entry2.title: 2. Collection and Processing of Data
entry2.text:
The tool only collects the data necessary to create an application:
• Desired position
• Relevant skills
• Type of application

entry3.title: 3. Storage and Security
entry3.text: All personal data is stored exclusively on the device and secured with AES‑256‑bit encryption.

entry4.title: 4. Disclosure to Third Parties
entry4.text: No personal data is passed on to third parties. Only anonymised data is transmitted to AI service providers for generating the application.

entry5.title: 5. Users' Rights
entry5.text: Users have the right to access, rectify and delete their locally stored data.

entry6.title: 6. Changes to the Privacy Policy
entry6.text: This privacy policy may be updated. The current version is always available in the app.

entry3.title: Disclaimer

entry4.title: Copyright
